name: Aloe Vera
funFact: Aloe Vera is often used in soothing skincare products.

name: Spider Plant
funFact: Spider Plant can live for over a hundred years.

name: Peace Lily
funFact: In some cultures, Peace Lily is considered a symbol of good luck.

name: Ficus
funFact: Ficus leaves can change color depending on the light exposure.

name: Bamboo Palm
funFact: Bamboo Palm has flowers that bloom only once a year.

name: Snake Plant
funFact: Interestingly, Snake Plant doesn't need soil to grow.

name: Pothos
funFact: Pothos can grow several feet in just a single season.

name: Dracaena
funFact: In the wild, Dracaena often serves as a habitat for small wildlife.

name: Philodendron
funFact: Philodendron is known to be one of the oldest living plants.

name: Rubber Plant
funFact: The sap of Rubber Plant is used in traditional remedies.

name: English Ivy
funFact: English Ivy has a unique ability to store water in its leaves.

name: Boston Fern
funFact: Boston Fern is often used in traditional medicine.

name: Palm Tree
funFact: Palm Tree is a favorite among gardeners for its low maintenance.

name: Cactus
funFact: Did you know that Cactus can survive in low light conditions?

name: Orchid
funFact: Orchid is known for its air-purifying qualities.

name: Succulent
funFact: Succulent is often used in traditional medicine.

name: Fern
funFact: Fern is a favorite among gardeners for its low maintenance.

name: Jade Plant
funFact: Jade Plant is known for its air-purifying qualities.

name: Calathea
funFact: Calathea is often used in traditional medicine.

name: ZZ Plant
funFact: The fragrance of ZZ Plant is used in perfumery.

name: Yucca

name: Bonsai

name: Monstera

name: Anthurium
